fulltext:
HOANG XUAN HUONG
Quan 2, TP.HCM, Viet Nam
WORK EXPERIENCE
INNOTECH VIETNAM
SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
2018 - NOW
Project Name: Tyme Digital Banking
Client From: South Africa
Description: Build application for Internet and Mobile Banking
Technical
-Web Service, Microservice
-Spring boot, JPA, Elasticsearch,Kafka
-MySQL,Oracle
Main responsibilities:
- Developing and maintaining the back-end functionality of system.
- Participating in discussions with Po,BA to clarify what they want.
- Designing patterns for project if required.
- Contacting external team to confirm info of requirement.
- Coding review.
- Document Service.
OMART VIETNAM
BACKEND TEAM LEADER
2017 - 2018
Project Name: e-commerce
Client From: Vietnam
Description: application for e-commerce, Web,Mobile
Technical
-Web Service
-Spring boot.JPA,Twilio, Fire Base,Elasticsearch,Google API Services
-My SQL
Main responsibilities:
-I am responsible a development REST API backend.
- Document API for integrate with Front-end Web and Mobile.
-Testing Service
-Code review
-Make sure deliver on time to production.
CSC VIETNAM (DXC VIETNAM)
SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEER
2014 - 2017
Project Name: SAP Portal Java
Client From: Canada
Description: enterprise portal for aircraft manufacturing industry
Technical:
- Web Dynpro Java 7.4
- Hibernate, JPA, EJB
- DB: Oracle
Main responsibilities:
-Upgrade to new version base on available application
-Interaction and Communication with onshore team
-Help other members to keep up with the software development
progress
Project Name: TLS
Client From: Singapore
Description: Telecoms licensing system of Singapore government
Technical:
-Struts 1,2
-IBatis
-Server: Weblogic
-DB: Oracle
Main responsibilities:
-Development and enhancement from existing application
-Maintain application after release.
-Help other members fix bug.
- Working with QC team and report task to project manager.
Project Name: MOH
Client From: Singapore
Description: Ministry of Health Singapore government
Technical:
-Spring Boot Web Service Restfull API, JPA, Hibernate.
-Angular 1 (front-end)
-Server: Weblogic
-DB: Oracle,H2 for dev
Main responsibilities:
-Development from Scratch base on requirements from QA.
- Working with BA,QC to clarify requirement from onshore team.
-Receive feedback from QC,QA to update requirement, fix bug if
needed
- Review business rules from other member after completed
- Reporting task to project manager
Project Name: FROG ASIA
Client From: Malaysia
Description: Building Highly Education Application
Technical:
-React Native
-Redux
-Run on IOS and Android device
Main responsibilities:
- Development from Scratch base on requirements from onshore.
- Working directly onshore team to clarify requirements
-Report task to onshore leader.
EWI VIETNAM
JAVA DEVELOPER
2013 - 2014
Project Name: PTUS
Client From: US
Description: enterprise portal for plastic industry
Technical
- Restfull Web Service Spring, MVC
- Hibernate
- Sencha Ext JS (front-end)
Main responsibilities:
-implement task assigned from team leader.
-fix bug and remain the existing source.
-reporting task to leader.
EDUCATION
BINH DUONG UNIVERSITY
MAJOR: SOFTWARE ENGINEER
2019 - 2013
CERTIFICATIONS
2014
TOEIC Certificate at IIG
